title: Trust, confidence in financial markets critical to gain traction among investors: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman - The Financial Express
content: Trust, confidence in financial markets critical to gain traction among investors: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman  The Financial Express
description: During an interaction with leaders of the financial and capital markets here, Sitharaman also asked them to explore ways to further strengthen the sector, according to an official release.
